players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I am innocent and need your help"
Diana: "I am the detective and I suspect Alice of being the mafioso. I found evidence during my investigation."
Bob: "I am innocent and have no idea who the mafioso is. I support Diana's suspicion."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
